name: @varlabs/monorun
description: A monorepo build system for JavaScript and TypeScript projects.
author: HamzaKV <hamzakv333@gmail.com>

scripts.build: bun run clean && tsc && bun run copy-files:notes && bun run copy-files:root
scripts.test:local: bun run build && cd ./dist && pnpm link
scripts.patch: bun run git:main && npm version patch && bun run git:push:main
scripts.minor: bun run git:main && npm version minor && bun run git:push:main
scripts.major: bun run git:main && npm version major && bun run git:push:main
scripts.roll: bun run build && cd dist && bun run publish
scripts.roll:patch: bun run patch && bun run roll
scripts.roll:minor: bun run minor && bun run roll
scripts.roll:major: bun run major && bun run roll
